Containers.Name: apt-cacher-ng
Containers.Description: Apt-Cacher NG is a caching proxy, specialized for package files from Linux distributors, primarily for Debian (and Debian based) distributions but not limited to those.[br][br] [b][u][span style='color: #E80000;']Configuration[/span][/u][/b][br] [b]/var/cache/apt-cacher-ng[/b] This is where apt-cacher-ng stores its cached.[br]
Containers.Overview: Apt-Cacher NG is a caching proxy, specialized for package files from Linux distributors, primarily for Debian (and Debian based) distributions but not limited to those.
